name: surrealist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or producing a type of 20th-century art or literature in which unusual or impossible things are shown happening: surrealist painters surrealist art See
surrealism
More examplesFewer examplesMost surrealist exhibitions feature few works by female artists, but not this one. They took turns speaking the lines of a surrealist poem by Tom Andrews. intriguing photographs supplied by various surrealist photographers

someone who produces a type of 20th-century art or literature in which unusual or impossible things are shown happening: Spanish surrealist, Salvador Dalí See
surrealism
More examplesFewer examplesHe trained as a painter enamored of the surrealists.In many photos taken of the surrealists , they pose with their eyes closed to signify their reverence for the dream state. Opened in 1984, it houses one of the most extensive collections of the works of the Spanish surrealist , valued at more than $500 million.
